Class LocationDAOPersistence

  • java.lang.Object

    LocationDAO
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class LocationDAOPersistence
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocationDAO
    LocationDAOPersistence is the implementation of the LocationDAO interface with DataNucleus.

        public boolean createLocationOnMap​(int uid,
                                   int mid,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String descr,
                                   java.lang.String label,
                                   double x,
                                   double y)
        Description copied from interface: LocationDAO
        Creates and adds a location on a map selected by its id. If the map doesn't exist nothing is added.
        Specified by:
        createLocationOnMap in interface LocationDAO
        Parameters:
        uid - the user identifier
        mid - the map identifier
        name - the location name
        descr - the location description
        label - the location label
        x - the longitude
        y - the latitude
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful
